name: David F. KELLY and Patricia Ann Kelly, his wife v. The CARBORUNDUM COMPANY, a corporation, Petitioner v. WILSON PRODUCTS, A DIVISION OF E.S.B. INDUSTRIES, INC., Power Piping Company, et al.

judges: LARSEN, J., files a concurring statement.
parties: David F. KELLY and Patricia Ann Kelly, his wife v. The CARBORUNDUM COMPANY, a corporation, Petitioner v. WILSON PRODUCTS, A DIVISION OF E.S.B. INDUSTRIES, INC., Power Piping Company, et al.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
The petition for allowance of appeal is granted.
In accordance with Heckendorn v. Consolidated Rail Corporation, 502 Pa. 101, 465 A.2d 609 (1983), the order of the Superior Court, 307 Pa.Super. 361, 453 A.2d 624 (1982), is affirmed.
PAPADAKOS, J., did not participate.
LARSEN, J., files a concurring statement.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

opinions.text:
LARSEN, Justice,
concurring.
I concur in this Order on the basis of my concurring opinion in Heckendorn v. Consolidated Rail Corporation, 502 Pa. 101, 465 A.2d 609 (1983).
opinions.author: LARSEN, Justice,

casebody.head_matter:
470 A.2d 969
David F. KELLY and Patricia Ann Kelly, his wife v. The CARBORUNDUM COMPANY, a corporation, Petitioner v. WILSON PRODUCTS, A DIVISION OF E.S.B. INDUSTRIES, INC., Power Piping Company, et al.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Feb. 6, 1984.
